title: Need a support for that tourney? I'll be there!
body:
I'm a P5 support (got a lot to learn), BUT I am extremely positive, can listen to shotcalls or make them when it counts.

I'm free on weekends so I can always fill in for your missing player ;D so if you need a support or just a general sub feel free to add me in game!

IGN: hehe nice meme

Why I'm doing this? I want to improve as an individual and as a team, and playing in tournaments will help me do just that.
